long SR04::DistanceAvg ( int  wait = DEFAULT_DELAY,
int  count = DEFAULT_PINGS 
)

Do count measurents and calculate the average. To avoid defilement from ow/high peaks, min/max values are substracted from the average

Parameters:
wait delay between measurements, default = DEFAULT_DELAY/ms
count number of measurements, default DEFAULT_PINGS
Returns:
long distance in centimeter

Definition at line 68 of file SR04.cpp.

References _distance.

long SR04::MicrosecondsToCentimeter ( long  duration  )  [private]

Do the measurement calculation and return result in centimeter SR04 measure echo time to obstacle and return way.
Sound travels with 340m/sec
Example: Obstace 100cm away from SR04. Measure time is 100cm to obstacle and 100cm return = 200cm
1sec = 1000ms = 1.000.000uS 1.000.000 / 340 = Distance in microseconds for 100cm 2941uS fuer 100cm = 5882 uS fuer 200cm

duration / 5882 * 100 = distance in cm
